row.entry: Vibrance is a widely used term in image processing but the mechanism and end result differ from program to program. Vibrance in darktable saturates and brings down the lightness of the most saturated pixels to make the colors more vivid.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Vibrance only has one parameter which controls the amount applied.

sect5.title: vibrance
sect5.para: The amount of vibrance to apply to the image.
